articles.original_title: Elon Musk Says Delaware Is "Bleeding Companies" As Coinbase Moves To Texas - Coinbase Global  ( NASDAQ:COIN )
articles.original_body: Coinbase Global Inc. ( NASDAQ:COIN ) announced plans on Wednesday to leave Delaware and reincorporate in Texas, sparking sharp reactions from tech and finance leaders. Chief Legal Officer Paul Grewal said the move "was not made lightly," describing it as a step to protect customers, ...

articles.original_title: Elon Musk Urges 'Move' To Austin After Coinbase Follows Tesla To Texas - Dropbox  ( NASDAQ:DBX ) , Coinbase Global  ( NASDAQ:COIN )
articles.original_body: Tesla Inc. ( NASDAQ:TSLA ) CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday renewed his attacks on Delaware's corporate regime after Coinbase Global Inc. ( NASDAQ:COIN ) said it will follow Tesla and SpaceX in abandoning the state as its legal home and reincorporate in Texas.

articles.original_title: Elon Musk warns about Delaware as another tech giant exits
articles.original_body: In 2024, Elon Musk moved both Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) and SpaceX to Texas after a Delaware court invalidated his $56 billion compensation package. In February this year, Dropbox cited “litigation risk” as it left Delaware and reincorporated elsewhere. Andreessen Horowitz, the Silicon Valley ...

articles.original_title: Anthropic commits US$50 billion to build AI data centres in US
articles.original_body: Anthropic plans to spend US$50 billion to build custom data centres for artificial intelligence work in several US locations, including Texas and New York, the latest expensive pledge for infrastructure to support the AI boom.

articles.original_title: TTEC Digital recognized as the 2025 Microsoft Dynamics 365 Service Partner of the Year
articles.original_body: AUSTIN, Texas, Nov. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TTEC Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: TTEC), a leading global CX (customer experience) technology and services innovator for AI-enabled CX, today announced that TTEC Digital has won the 2025 Microsoft Dynamics 365 Service Partner of the Year Award. The company was honored among a global field of top Microsoft partners for demonstrating excellence in innovation and implementation of customer solutions based on Microsoft technology. “We are thrilled to be rec

articles.original_title: Anthropic announces $50B investment in new US data centers to meet AI demand
articles.original_body: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic announced a $50 billion investment in computing infrastructure on Wednesday that will include new data centers in Texas and New York.  Anthropic, maker of the chatbot Claude, said it is working with London-based Fluidstack to build the new computing facilities to power its AI systems.  A report last month from TD Cowen said that the leading cloud computing providers leased a “staggering” amount of U.S. data center capacity in the third fiscal quarter of this year, amounting to more than 7.4 gigawatts of energy, more than all of last year combined.

articles.raw_text: Anthropic announces $50B investment in new US data centers to meet AI demand Artificial intelligence company Anthropic announced a $50 billion investment in computing infrastructure on Wednesday that will include new data centers in Texas and New York.  Anthropic, maker of the chatbot Claude, said it is working with London-based Fluidstack to build the new computing facilities to power its AI systems.  A report last month from TD Cowen said that the leading cloud computing providers leased a “staggering” amount of U.S. data center capacity in the third fiscal quarter of this year, amounting to more than 7.4 gigawatts of energy, more than all of last year combined. Artificial intelligence company Anthropic announced a $50 billion investment in computing infrastructure on Wednesday that will include new data centers in Texas and New York.  Anthropic, maker of the chatbot Claude, said it is working with London-based Fluidstack to build the new computing facilities to power its AI systems.  A report last month from TD Cowen said that the leading cloud computing providers leased a “staggering” amount of U.S. data center capacity in the third fiscal quarter of this year, amounting to more than 7.4 gigawatts of energy, more than all of last year combined.

articles.original_title: Anthropic to spend $50 billion on U.S. AI infrastructure, starting with Texas, New York data centers
articles.original_body: Anthropic rival OpenAI has secured more than $1.4 trillion worth of deals with Nvidia, Broadcom, Oracle and the major cloud providers.

articles.original_title: IREN Stock Could Soar Nearly 500% by 2028 on Microsoft AI Deal, Says Cantor
articles.original_body: IREN has joined the ranks of large-scale "neocloud" providers, said analyst Brett Knoblach, adding credibility to the company’s ambitions to scale to $18.6 billion in annual revenue across its Texas and Canadian sites.

articles.original_title: What IREN (IREN)'s Landmark Microsoft AI Cloud Deal Means For Shareholders
articles.original_body: Microsoft recently announced a multi-year US$9.7 billion agreement with IREN Limited to access Nvidia GB300 GPUs through phased deployments at IREN's Texas data center campus, supported by a related US$5.8 billion procurement agreement for GPUs and equipment with Dell Technologies. This development highlights IREN's successful shift from cryptocurrency mining to AI cloud infrastructure, positioning the company as a significant partner for global technology leaders seeking advanced,...

articles.original_title: CORRECTING and REPLACING SolarWinds Launches Autonomous Operational Resilience Tour
articles.original_body: AUSTIN, Texas, November 07, 2025--The "AWS re:Invent:" section of the release dated November 6, 2025 should read: AWS re:Invent: You can find SolarWinds at booth 1380, where three demo stations and refreshments will be available, along with the opportunity to enter for a chance to win exclusive SolarWinds gear and Build and Connect sets.
